director.name: 贾思敏·洛佩斯 Jazmín López

introduction: Based on real-life events, Presidente deals with the dark story of María Estela Martínez de Perón, the first woman in history to be president of a republican country, and teh second spouse of Juan Perón. In politics and in private, she tries to navigate a male dominated world, between real and formal power. Overburdened by the mythic figue of Eva Perón, she tries, by supernatural means, to extract from her embalmed body the charisma that she lacks.Jazmin Lopez
